H0.text: Which gland controls the release of hormones. Pituitary

H1.text: Which gland controls the release of hormones. Thyroid

H2.text: Which gland controls the release of hormones. Adrenal

H3.text: Which gland controls the release of hormones. Hypophyse

A4.text: The pituitary gland and the hypothalamus control much of the body's endocrine system.

A5.text: Thyroid-stimulating hormone (TSH) is released under the influence of hypothalamic thyrotropin-releasing hormone (TRH) and is inhibited by somatostatin.
